titleStmt.title: The rod of recompence, or, The hand of justice in the punishment of the enemies of church & state by Gods providence and justice brought about after they had by the space of eighteen years afflicted and tormented both / written by John Conset.
titleStmt.author: Conset, John, d. 1673.
